name: You went skiing, but you lost control
name_original: You went skiing, but you lost control
description:
Please note: This game and all  its assets  were made in 3 hours and 30 minutes

It was snowing, the air was cold enough to shock frost your breath and, as is custom for these types of winter weekends, you went skiing... but you lost control.

Now you're tumbling down the mountain you were supposed to have an enjoyable evening on. Maybe by some divine intervention you can make it down safely?

How to play: 

You control a rock, which you can throw, with your left mouse button, in front of the poor skier. Depending on the angle with which the rock lands, it will send the skier flying at different angles. Clear as many gaps as possible and set a highscore!

Team Size: 3
Pixelart by https://twitter.com/e_Pics_
Music by https://twitter.com/paninjin
Coding by https://twitter.com/greenpixels_
